DataElement.preferredName: Classification Programming Parameter Support Vector Machine Cost Function java.lang.Double
DataElement.preferredDefinition:
A method of generalization, the systematic arrangement of entities into classes or groups based on mutual similarity and certain differing characteristics.:A value that is passed to a routine._A classification method that will construct a hyperplane
between two sets of data such that it maximizes the margin between the hyperplane and the nearest samples.:A function or expression that is either maximized or
minimized in order to obtain the optimal solution for a mathematical problem._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Double-precision floating point number (64-bit IEEE 7540).
